# Place Items

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                        | Support     |
| ---------------------------- | ----------- |
| `place-items-start`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-items-end`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-items-center`         | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-items-baseline`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `place-items-stretch`        | ğŸŒ Web only |
